data.title: Cape Fear Film Press Kit
data.meta_description: Universal City, CA: Universal Studios, 1991. Ephemera. The press kit for the film remake of the 1962 classic based on the novel The Executioners by John D. Macdonald. data.text:
Scorsese, Martin (director) and John D. Macdonald (novel)

Notes: The press kit for the film remake (of the 1962 classic) based on the novel The Executioners by John D. Macdonald. The film was directed by Martin Scorsese and starred Robert De Niro, Nick Nolte, Jessica Lange, Joe Don Baker, and Juliet Lewis. Also, several actors from the 1962 original have cameo roles in this film (Robert Mitchum, Gregory Peck and Martin Balsam).

The film was released on November 13, 1991. The press kit, housed in the original studio folder with photo illustration includes: 13 black and white film stills with captions, 24-pages of production notes, 7 pages of credits, and 5 bio packets for Martin Scorsese (5 pp), Robert De Niro (3 pp), Nick Nolte (4 pp), Juliette Lewis (3 pp) and Jessica Lange (3 pp).

In the film, De Niro, playing a convicted rapist, released from prison after serving a 14-year sentence, stalks the family of the lawyer (Nolte) who originally defended him.

Edition + Condition: Contents fine; paper folder very good with some edge tears.

Publication: Universal City, CA: Universal Studios, 1991.

Item No: #306614
